name: Neonomad Finance
description: NeoNomad Finance is one of the first decentralized ecosystems to bridge the gap between traditional finance, real world-assets, and DeFi on Solana. It is an all-inclusive, integrated ecosystem, providing diverse DeFi services and tools under one roof. Some of these services include a DEX, integrated payments services, and asset-backed NFTs. On the DEX, NeoNomad provides lending, yield farming, and staking, among other services.
